snippet: Chris Collins, Sean Patrick Maloney, Hakeem Jeffries and Grace Meng in New York, and Elizabeth H. Esty of Connecticut, represent an ideological mix.
abstract: Five new faces from New York and Connecticut are heading to Washington following a campaign season of hard-fought Congressional contests; Chris Collins, Sean Patrick Maloney, Hakeem Jeffries and Grace Meng of New York, and Elizabeth H Esty of Connecticut, are a group notable for diverse backgrounds and an ideological mix.
lead_paragraph: Chris Collins, Sean Patrick Maloney, Hakeem Jeffries and Grace Meng in New York, and Elizabeth H. Esty of Connecticut, represent an ideological mix.

headline.seo: New Faces in U.S. House From New York and Connecticut
headline.main: Diverse Backgrounds for 5 New Faces Sent to House
headline.print_headline: Diverse Backgrounds for 5 New Faces Sent to House
